Posts.Content: Jan 23, 2008 03:00PM BELLA44 wrote: Hi there, Yes I worked thru my chemo and rad, I would workÂ  2 wks and have i week off, I work in a call centre so it was quite good as I would sit all day and answer phones. The week that I had off was the week that I had chemo, so I felt fine the other two weeks. I am very lucky with my employer, they have been very good to me. Do if you can and don't if you can't.
